description: React component MapView.jsx that renders a map using Leaflet with OpenStreetMap tiles, supporting center and marker positioning, zoom, and resize handling.

methods.name: clampLat
methods.description: Clamps latitude to the range [-90, 90], returns null if input is invalid.

methods.name: clampLng
methods.description: Wraps longitude to the range [-180, 180], returns null if input is invalid.
